resources.string: No backups found - press menu-key to create some.
The to import the SMS, please enable the airplane mode and try importing the messages again.
Error at \"%s\": deleted \"%d\" instead of \"%d\" playlists.

Do you really want to delete the file %s?
Max. number of backups of one type
Hide warnings about incomplete data before im- and export
The import of the %s will be very likely incomplete.
The export of the %s will be very likely incomplete.

If you don\'t change the default Messaging application to the value before the change that was needed for the SMS import, all incomming messages will be lost since Slight backup cannot process incomming messages.
Enable the airplanemode while Slight backup is the default Messaging application. Slight backup cannot process incomming messages such that they will be lost.

In order to import SMS, Slight backup has to be defined as the default Messaging application. Since Slight backup cannot process incomming messages, the airplane mode has to be activated while Slight backup is the default Messaging application. After the change of the standard Messaging application, tap on the backupfile again to initiate the import. After the import, the prior Messaging application has to be set as the standard Messaging application again to prevent the loss of incomming messages (Slight backup will try to initiate the change). After Slight backup is not the standard Messaging application anymore, the airplane mode can be disabled.
